app.title: Liven: Discover yourself
app.description:
Liven is your self-discovery companion, a system of tools designed to help you better understand and transform yourself. 

WHO’S LIVEN FOR?  
• For you, me, anyone trying to survive in this hyperstimulated world.    
• For those under pressure, living to meet others’ expectations, or struggling to say ‘no’.  
• For those wanting to build a positive self-image, improve focus, or manage time.  
• For anyone ready to liven up!

Are you ready to take your inner dialogue out of your head and gain a new perspective on life? Because if you are, we’ve got tools to help you observe your experiences and reframe your days. Sounds good?

  

CHECK OUT OUR APPROACH:

• Personalized program

Set a clear, achievable goal—whether it's improving your self-image, saying "no," or challenging negative thoughts. Choose your direction, and we'll help you get there with evidence-based techniques and tools. 

• Mood tracker

Pause during the day to check in with your emotions. See how you're doing—Good, Bad, Amazing! Use our emotional menu to name your feelings, notice what triggered them, and track changes over time with the Mood Calendar.

• Routine builder

Check out our Tasks tool to plan new activities and get ideas for things to try each day. By adding new tasks and routines to your days, you can change your behaviour and transform.   

• AI companion

Ever wish someone would listen to you rant without judgment, even at 3 a.m.? Meet Livie, our AI companion. If you're tired of the inner dialogue or need a fresh perspective on life, just talk to her. She'll help you break down your situations and suggest new ideas to try.  

• Bite-size knowledge

Scientists have studied the human mind for over 100 years, uncovering how our emotions, thoughts, and actions connect to unconscious "auto-pilot" behaviors. We've distilled this knowledge into bite-sized insights for you to apply in your decision-making.     

• Well-being tests

Everyone loves quizzes! Take a break and answer a set of questions to define experiences you’re going through. Check back every week to track the changes in emotional and behavioural dynamics.        

• Deep focus soundscapes

When you don’t feel like listening to music but still want to wear headphones and block out the world, try our soundscapes.

———————

WHAT OUR USERS ARE SAYING ABOUT US

"Positive thoughts and a calmer attitude come after 10 minutes of use."

"Great app to use as a guide at the start of your day."

"Liven is helping me turn healthy activities into habits."

———————
SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS
After you decide to begin your growth with Liven and download the app, you can unlock all features by subscribing to the premium subscription.
If you choose to purchase a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase.


Our app aims to provide you with helpful guidance on mindfulness. However, it is important to note that the information presented in the app is for general purposes only, and should not be considered as a substitute for professional medical care.

Livie is not a substitute for professional advice. It helps you understand your feelings, discover self-care ideas, and manage overwhelming thoughts. Please consult a professional if you need medical advice.

This app is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any health conditions, and may not be suitable for everyone.

Therefore, we strongly advise that you consult with a healthcare professional before adopting any advice or activities suggested in the app.
Please use this app at your discretion, and always keep in mind your own unique needs and circumstances.

Privacy Policy: https://quiz.theliven.com/en/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://quiz.theliven.com/en/terms-of-use

reviews.author: katanitaadl20375
reviews.title: App would not load
reviews.content: I paid the 20 dollars for the app, and then when I kept trying to load my personalized plan it would not load at all. I tried downloading the app again and restarting but nothing happened. I ended up deleting the app and my membership so I would not be charged again. Would not recommend.

I would recommend this app or process to anybody who wants to feel more at home with themselves.

reviews.author: JDel427
reviews.title: Fake ratings
reviews.content: This app is horrible and I’ll take partial blame by not realizing all of the upselling they try to do at checkout. They try selling multiple add ons and even hit you with the “final offer, 50% off of this/that”. Once you download the app, no notifications reminding you. No help with the app. Says to journal stuff each day? I could write in my notes just fine. Has sounds that do not help with sleep or focus. Just a whole bunch of lies on this app. If you fell for it, be sure to search subscriptions and turn off auto renew. Horrible app, horrible company.

reviews.author: cmk221723
reviews.title: Great App
reviews.content: As someone who works in Mental health and has their own struggles, this app is great. It doesn’t replace a good therapist but it is great on psychoeducation and temporary support. Great mood tracker. The AI feature I was suspicious about it but seems to work great especially in helping with coping strategies when you aren’t thinking clearly. Highly recommend and will be recommending to clients.

reviews.author: Andrzejek1976
reviews.title: Not worth it

reviews.title: Iwonka Story
reviews.content: Iwona Story

reviews.author: )p.a.r.k.y(
reviews.title: Useless content, money trap
reviews.content:
First of all the content is fairly useless to me. Knowing *what* I need to do isn’t the problem, knowing *how* to do it is. This app does not help with that at all. 
Secondly the funding model is designed in such a way as to prey on the characteristics of the neurodiverse people the app is marketed to.
Folks with ADHD will sign up to this app and then forget to cancel before being hit with huge monthly fees. It feels like a scam.

reviews.author: AdamJ (UK)
reviews.title: Pricey subscription and dubious mention of OpenAI in privacy policy
reviews.content: You open the app and you’re guided through a long and well constructed questionnaire style self assessment. Then when you’re finished it gives you an insight about your answers and asks you to subscribe for £7.99 a WEEK

reviews.author: Isleofwighter
reviews.title: Reoccurring bill
reviews.content: I have cancelled this subscription months ago, but they continue to take transactions of 49.99 multiple times a month!

reviews.author: Shellye_e
reviews.title: ‼️Misleading Subscription – Be Careful‼️
reviews.content:
The app itself may work fine, but the subscription model is like a trap. I trialed it without realizing I’d be rolled into a £49.99 monthly plan — almost £600 a year — when the same app costs just £59.99 annually. I was charged over £460 for something I never used, while other customers pay a fraction of that.

The terms are hidden in small print, and from the number of similar reviews, I’m clearly not the only one caught out. Please make this clearer and stop setting customers up to fail.

This feels like stealing from unsuspecting customers and gives me that feeling that this is a semi scam company! BEWARE!!

reviews.author: JoJoByf333
reviews.title: Making anxiety worse for some people…
reviews.content:
Seems like a great app! A lot of people are struggling financially which is generating stress, anxiety etc.

To be then told there’s this amazing app… but there’s no basic free version is like a kick in the teeth (plus they don’t tell you until the end of the whole survey). 

£8 per week is a large amount for some people genuinely struggling.

reviews.author: MrSmith0011
reviews.title: Watch out for Auto Renewal
reviews.content:
I wasn’t using this app at all. I forgot I’d even installed it until a few months later when I was hit with an auto renewal charge of £99.

I saw it pending in my bank and even contacted my bank about it as if completely forgot I’d even installed this app.

I had no email, no notifications from the app telling me I was going to be charged. Absolutely nothing. 

I’m writing this review as I don’t want others to fall victim to this!

Sneaky thieving bunch. Useless App too - just a glorified notepad for writing down feelings. Teaches you basic kids grade level CBT too. AVOID AVOID AVOID

reviews.author: Orence1966
reviews.title: Amazing service team
reviews.content: I was investigating and trialling this app and accidentally went all the way through the purchase process to see what the total costs were. The support team could not have been more helpful in return returning my subscription they were super responsive and quick and no questions asked. I think what these guys are trying to do is brilliant and it looks like it’s helping millions of people around the world with a very serious problem.Could not recommend them all the app highly enough it’s brilliant.

reviews.author: dph74
reviews.title: S'okay...
reviews.content: There's lots to like about this App & its content, but it's all a bit saccharine sweet, particularly so in the long, detailed reply to these user Comments. I'm sure it's all done with integrity & care, but after my 3 month discounted trial, I hope I'll have ingrained habits that will allow me to return to Vita Minds material from the NHS. That material just seems more real & rich TBH. Thaks anyhow - I'll save giving hundreds of pounds to a few people at the top raking in the profits for unchanging content. No need to Reply!
